title: Navigation & Landmarks
description: Learn how to describe locations and landmarks.

steps.pinyin: yín háng zài yóu jú páng biān.
steps.english_hint: The bank is next to the post office.

steps.pinyin: tú shū guǎn zài gōng yuán hòu miàn.
steps.english_hint: The library is behind the park.

steps.teacher: 從車站走過來大概五分鐘。
expected_answer: 從車站走過來大概五分鐘。
steps.pinyin: cóng chē zhàn zǒu guò lái dà gài wǔ fēn zhōng.
steps.english_hint: It's about five minutes walking from the station.

steps.teacher: 便利商店在第一個路口的右邊。
expected_answer: 便利商店在第一個路口的右邊。
steps.pinyin: biàn lì shāng diàn zài dì yī gè lù kǒu de yòu biān.
steps.english_hint: The convenience store is on the right at the first intersection.

steps.teacher: 你會看到一棟白色的大樓。
expected_answer: 你會看到一棟白色的大樓。
steps.pinyin: nǐ huì kàn dào yí dòng bái sè de dà lóu.
steps.english_hint: You will see a big white building.

steps.pinyin: xué xiào zài shì chǎng de duì miàn.
steps.english_hint: The school is across from the market.

steps.teacher: 餐館在第二個紅綠燈左轉的地方。
expected_answer: 餐館在第二個紅綠燈左轉的地方。
steps.pinyin: cān guǎn zài dì èr gè hóng lǜ dēng zuǒ zhuǎn de dì fāng.
steps.english_hint: The restaurant is at the second traffic light on the left.

steps.teacher: 沿著河邊一直走就到了。
expected_answer: 沿著河邊一直走就到了。
steps.pinyin: yán zhe hé biān yī zhí zǒu jiù dào le.
steps.english_hint: Walk along the river and you'll reach it.

steps.teacher: 博物館離這裡不遠，可以走路。
expected_answer: 博物館離這裡不遠，可以走路。
steps.pinyin: bó wù guǎn lí zhè lǐ bù yuǎn, kě yǐ zǒu lù.
steps.english_hint: The museum is not far from here; you can walk.

steps.teacher: 火車站在市中心的東邊。
expected_answer: 火車站在市中心的東邊。
steps.pinyin: huǒ chē zhàn zài shì zhōng xīn de dōng biān.
steps.english_hint: The train station is on the east side of downtown.
